properties.areaDesc: Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley
properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 4 at 9:01AM PST until February 5 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low
as 28 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30
mph with gusts up to 45 mph.

* WHERE...Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM PST
Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 3 PM PST this
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other
sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause
hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be
frosted.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for
extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY
